short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a random image/video and the time/date on your new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a new random image or video with a few simple customization options. No spying, no ads, it's open source on github if you want to inspect the source or make your own.
